constituent: fat, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, delicious, spoon, sun, day
heisigStory: This kanji tells us that if you feed the flesh with too many delicious things, it soon picks up a thick layer of fat.
koohiiStory1: Every chef will tell you, fat is what make the meat taste delicious.
koohiiStory2: Fat is the most delicious part of the flesh. (Note this refers to physical fat, not the concept of obesity obese (#494)).
myStory: béo. ăn ngon miệng là chất béo
words:
脂肪(しぼう): fat, grease, blubber
脂(あぶら): fat, lard
